<!-- Inline new rule -->
:::new:rule name=project-auth
# Project Authentication Rules

- Always use JWT for authentication
- Never store passwords in plain text
- Use bcrypt with salt rounds >= 10
- Implement rate limiting on auth endpoints
:::end

:::new:workflow name=ci-pipeline
# CI Pipeline

1. Run tests
2. Build artifacts
3. Deploy to staging
4. Run integration tests
5. Deploy to production
:::end

## Project-Specific Notes

This is custom project documentation.
Everything outside directive blocks is preserved automatically!

### Setup Instructions

- Run `npm install`
- Copy `.env.example` to `.env`
- Configure your database connection

No special markers needed!
